autotransform.item package

Submodules

autotransform.item.base module

The base class and associated classes for Item components. Can be used as a generic Item.

class autotransform.item.base.Item(key: str, extra_data: Optional[Mapping[str, Any]] = None)

Bases: abc.ABC

The base for Item components. Returned by Input components and act as the units on which AutoTransform operates.

_extra_data

Any extra data that needs to be associated with this Item.Should be JSON encodable.

Type

Optional[Mapping[str, Any]]

_key

A unique key used to represent this item, such as a file path.

Type

str

bundle() → autotransform.item.base.ItemBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

ItemBundle

classmethod from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.item.base.Item

Produces an instance of the component from decoded data.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the Item.

Return type

Item

Returns

Gets the unique key that represents the Item.

Returns

The unique key representing the Item.

static get_type() → autotransform.item.type.ItemType

Used to map Item components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Item.

class autotransform.item.base.ItemBundle

Bases: TypedDict

A bundled version of the Item object used for JSON encoding.

key: str

autotransform.item.factory module

A simple factory for producing Items from type and param information.

class autotransform.item.factory.ItemFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for Items. Maps a type to an Item.

_map

A mapping from ItemType to the from_data function of the appropriate Item.

Type

Dict[ItemType, Callable[[Mapping[str, Any]], Item]]

static get(bundle: autotransform.item.base.ItemBundle) → autotransform.item.base.Item

Simple get method using the _map attribute.

Parameters

bundle (ItemBundle) – The bundled Item type and params.

Returns

An instance of the associated Item.

Return type

Item

autotransform.item.file module

The base class and associated classes for Item components.

class autotransform.item.file.FileItem(key: str, extra_data: Optional[Mapping[str, Any]] = None)

Bases: autotransform.item.base.Item

An item representing a file that can be used by AutoTransform. Provides some utility methods for interacting with the file.

_extra_data

Any extra data that needs to be associated with this Item. Should be JSON encodable.

Type

Mapping[str, Any]

_key

A unique key used to represent this item, such as a file path.

Type

str

get_content() → str

Gets the content of the file.

Returns

The file’s content.

Return type

str

get_path() → str

Gets the path of the file.

Returns

The file’s path.

Return type

str

Returns

The unique type associated with this Item.

Writes new content to the file.

autotransform.item.type module

The type of Item, used create a 1:1 mapping.

class autotransform.item.type.ItemType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for 1:1 Type to type mapping.

FILE = 'file'
GENERIC = 'generic'

Module contents

Items are used by AutoTransform as the things upon which a Schema acts. They can represent things like files. Input components generate the list of Items for a transformation.
